summary: Polyethylene glycol (PEG) is a chemical made from petroleum. It's like a long chain of molecules, and we use it for lots of things, like making products in factories and helping doctors treat people. Sometimes it's called polyethylene oxide (PEO) or polyoxyethylene (POE), depending on how big the chain is. Its chemical structure is made up of repeating units of oxygen, carbon, and hydrogen atoms.
title: Polyethylene glycol
